column4: Hello!! can somebody help me?? i have a black screen when i activate the restricted drivers for my nvidia graphic card on my laptop =( using ubunto 9.10 and i have the same problem when i install it manually downloading the latest driver from nvida website
Yep - don't use the restricted driver :-)
but i cant see fullscreen videos without it.... =( and i cant use the full graphic enviroment....
Have you tried all of the options you get from the restricted driver tool?
